title: Dry-run release verification
description:
Test the release process using GoReleaser dry-run mode.

WHY: Validate release automation works correctly before attempting an actual release.

WHAT: Create test tag and run GoReleaser in dry-run mode to verify artifact generation.
design:
Test release process:
1. Create test tag: git tag -a v0.0.0-test -m 'Test release'
2. Run: goreleaser release --clean --skip-publish --skip-sign
3. Verify artifacts in dist/
4. Clean up: git tag -d v0.0.0-test

Reference: quickstart.md 'Testing the Release Process' section
acceptance_criteria:
- Test tag created successfully
- GoReleaser dry-run completes without errors
- dist/ contains binaries for all platforms
- checksums.txt generated
- Test tag cleaned up after verification
